description: This file defines extension methods for ClaimsPrincipal to extract the user ID (GUID) from JWT claims, specifically the 'sub' claim.

classes.name: ClaimsExtensions
classes.description: A static class providing extension methods for ClaimsPrincipal to facilitate claims handling, specifically for extracting user IDs.

methods.name: GetUserId
methods.description: Extension method that retrieves the user ID as a GUID from the JWT 'sub' claim, throwing exceptions if the claim is missing or invalid.
